original_text: And in that day shall ye say, Praise the Lord, call upon his name, declare his doings among the people, make mention that his name is exalted.
korean_text: 그 날에 너희가 또 말하기를 여호와께 감사하라 그의 이름을 부르며 그의 행하심을 만국 중에 선포하며 그의 이름이 높다 하라

sentences.original_text: And in that day shall ye say
declare his doings among the people
make mention that his name is exalted
